title: Fushigi YÃ»gi: The Mysterious Play, Vol. 1: Priestess
description: When best friends Miaka and Yui open the pages of an ancient Chinese book, they are transported into the Universe of the Four Gods, a parallel world to ancient China. Now, to escape schoolwork and family problems, Miaka flees to the parallel world, only to find a lot more danger and romance than she bargained for.
author: Yuu Watase
